about_the_game:
Embark on an cozy and immersive adventure as a forester in charge of the breathtaking open world of Beaverly Hills. Experience a forest filled with lush wildlife, surprising characters and important work to be done, all from the comfort of your home!

Tired of city life? Look no further! Keep the forest healthy and thriving by completing your tasks and engaging with this unique environment. From planting trees, tracking animals and identifying rare plants, through taking part in ethical harvesting, to preventing fires, helping police find missing people and pursuing forestry criminals, supervise the everyday life of Beaverly Hills. Interact with animals and tourists, complete side characters’ quests and face various challenges while rebuilding a picturesque haven that will return the favor by slowly revealing its secrets.

Explore the vast open world of Beaverly Hills! There’s more to this forest than meets the eye. With many distinct ecosystems and various activities spread across the map, observe lifelike complex simulations of wildlife and its natural habitats. Each animal has a unique temper and some can even become friendly enough to stay by your side. Become a part of this world and watch it change.

Delve into every nook and cranny and meet the locals of Beaverly Hills. Interacting with them can prove useful in the long run. Get popular among the forest community and gain their favor to make future tasks easier. Who knows, they might also reveal a little something about the hidden gems of this area.

The beauty of this world should be preserved. While you walk around, drive your car or take your boat out to a lake, use the photo mode to take memorable photos of your ventures into the wilds. Who knows what you’ll find while swimming or climbing?

However, you’ll need to develop your explorer skills to unlock every corner of this vast and breathtaking forest. With an extensive skill tree to upgrade, you'll have the potential to become a master at your job and uncover the forest's hidden treasures. Utilize your upgraded skills to overcome challenges along the way, and pave the way for sustainable forestry practices.

With support for PlayStation DualSense/DualShock 4, Xbox Controller, a wide range of other gamepads and fully customizable bindings for mouse and keyboard, adjust your gameplay.

A unique interface design and a wide range of usability options (eg. colorblindness, subtitles configuration) improves the overall experience for every willing forester.

Advanced graphics settings allow to optimize the game performance best suited for your specific needs. Moreover, Forester Simulator will be optimized specifically for Steam Deck, offering a special graphics mode for Valve's handheld device.
